comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Welcome! I'm always glad to see a new poker place...I like old-school design, I registered and checked the tables (unfortunately they are all empty), maybe just bad hours (it's still morning where I am). I wanted to check deposits and I am a bit confused with the "deposit form" we need to submit, that's the first time for me. A $25 min deposit is ok, and nice promotion for min $50 deposit... but I need to say that some other crypto poker places don't have minimum deposits and have tables with lower min-blinds (0.01-0.02). Well, I will check again later to see if there are any players, and maybe I will join. Good luck!

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I am glad you made it to this platform. Welcome onboard. Your poker game is a nice one but your user interface is very poor and not catchy to attract traffic. I had to go through the site and upon registration, my real name was requested why? Unlike other participants who would object that, will it not be nice you use only user ID so as to cover the identity of players on your platform.As I checked your website, there are no FAQ, no terms and conditions, no policy, no customer support on the front page. All these you have written here should be on your front page of your website so that prospective participants visiting your website could see for themselves and have something to know about your poker game site.As you may know, your popularity here is not as strong as you just got onboard which means you will have others to contend with so I will advise you to do a good marketing and promotional campaign so as to gain audience and awareness of your poker game here. You can seek the expertise of a good campaign manager to aid in advertising your project and have it in mind that the minimum period should be atleast 2months so as to create a good awareness of your project here.Lastly, I will suggest to you that you use this thread as your Announcement thread and I believe that you are the representative of your project here and in that case you will have to be active so as to respond to questions and inquiries about your project as participants here are very sensitive to that aspect of customer care service because that determine how they would be attended to when onboard your platform.All the very best as you enjoy your stay here.
